@dev Unsigned math operations with safety checks that revert on error.

attributes.documentation:
@title Standard ERC20 token

     * @dev Implementation of the basic standard token.
https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-20
Originally based on code by FirstBlood:
https://github.com/Firstbloodio/token/blob/master/smart_contract/FirstBloodToken.sol

     * This implementation emits additional Approval events, allowing applications to reconstruct the allowance status for
all accounts just by listening to said events. Note that this isn't required by the specification, and other
compliant implementations may not do it.
attributes.name: ERC20

attributes.documentation:
@title Pausable
@dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
attributes.name: Pausable

attributes.documentation: @return True if the contract is paused, false otherwise.
attributes.name: paused

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
attributes.name: whenNotPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
attributes.name: whenPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev Called by a pauser to pause, triggers stopped state.
attributes.name: pause

attributes.documentation: @dev Called by a pauser to unpause, returns to normal state.
attributes.name: unpause
